data.text: - Charlottesville was a very difficult situation

data.text: of Black Lives Matter for several years now,

data.text: I did vote for Donald Trump.

data.text: - I guess I could ask you this then right away.

translation.text: - Tôi đoán tôi có thể hỏi bạn điều này sau đó ngay lập tức.

data.text: Are you offended by the statement All Lives Matter?

data.text: - I wish with all my heart that people just used it

data.text: as like, "You are absolutely right, all lives do matter,

translation.text: giống như, "Bạn hoàn toàn đúng, tất cả cuộc sống đều có vấn đề,

data.text: contrarian shut down sort of way,
